title: Asymptotics for the Laplace transform of the time integral of the geometric Brownian motion. (arXiv:2306.09084v1 [q-fin.PR])
abstract: We present an asymptotic result for the Laplace transform of the time integral of the geometric Brownian motion $F(\theta,T) = \mathbb{E}[e^{-\theta X_T}]$ with $X_T = \int_0^T e^{\sigma W_s + ( a - \frac12 \sigma^2)s} ds$, which is exact in the limit $\sigma^2 T \to 0$ at fixed $\sigma^2 \theta T^2$ and $aT$. This asymptotic result is applied to pricing zero coupon bonds in the Dothan model of stochastic interest rates. The asymptotic result provides an approximation for bond prices which is in good agreement with numerical evaluations in a wide range of model parameters. As a side result we obtain the asymptotics for Asian option prices in the Black-Scholes model, taking into account interest rates and dividend yield contributions in the $\sigma^{2}T\to 0$ limit.

translated_title: 几何布朗运动时间积分的拉普拉斯变换的渐近性质
translated_abstract: 本文给出了几何布朗运动时间积分 $X_T = \int_0^T e^{\sigma W_s + ( a - \frac12 \sigma^2)s} ds$ 的拉普拉斯变换 $F(\theta,T) = \mathbb{E}[e^{-\theta X_T}]$ 的渐近性质。当 $\sigma^2T\to0$ 时，渐近结果在固定 $\sigma^2\theta T^2$ 和 $aT$ 的情况下是精确的。该渐近结果被应用于随机利率的Dothan模型中的零票债券定价。此渐近结果为债券价格提供了一个近似值，并且在各种模型参数的范围内与数值评估结果相一致。作为一个附带结果，我们将固定 $\sigma^{2}T\to 0$ 时，根据利率和股息抵消的 $\sigma^{2}T\to 0$ 极限结果考虑在Black-Scholes模型中Asian期权价格的渐近性质。
tldr: 本文针对几何布朗运动时间积分的拉普拉斯变换给出了在 $\sigma^2T\to0$ 时的精确渐近结果，并将其应用于随机利率Dothan模型中的零票债券定价。此渐近结果为债券价格提供了一个近似值，同时还给出了Black-Scholes模型中Asian期权价格的渐近性质。
